prime.avm2.display.DisplayList

type
class
implements
prime.bindable.collections.IEditableList<prime.avm2.display._DisplayList.ChildType>
available in
swf
Wrapper class to add children to the given DisplayObjectContainer.

Constructor

new(target : flash.display.DisplayObjectContainer, ?owner : prime.gui.display.IDisplayContainer)

Instance Variables

change(default,null) : prime.core.events.ListChangeSignal<prime.avm2.display._DisplayList.ChildType>

length(accessor,null) : Int

mouseEnabled(default,accessor) : Bool

Property to enable mouse events on children or not

owner(default,null) : prime.gui.display.IDisplayContainer

Owner contains a reference to the object that created this displaylist instance. Normally this reference is the same as the target property but the DisplayObject will in some cases be a different object than the owner.

tabEnabled(default,accessor) : Bool

Property to enable tab events on children or not

target(default,null) : flash.display.DisplayObjectContainer

Target display-object. This display-object will be controlled by the DisplayList instance.
